speech: "I already know everything about chemistry, so I'm actually here looking for competent scientists to recruit to my startup lab."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "I've scoped out a number of candidates, and all that remains is to test them."
speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Everything important, anyway."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Which chemicals explode on mixture, which combine to create toxic gasses, and which give off radiation, hee hee!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "And of course, which elements are boring, and don't react much at all."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: (Wow, he so concerned with lab safety he know all the things to avoid.)
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "Now, there's more to a lab than just elemental chemistry."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "You need team chemistry as well!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Oolong good at teams!"
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "I'm not sure yet."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "You look a bit funny, but there's more to a scientist than meets the eye."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Take my pal Percy over there."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "To look at him, you'd think he was a brilliant physicist, hee hee!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: (A fizzy sis? Oolong is really going to have to show off his skills to get onto this team.)
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "Oolong can be just as fizzy!"
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "I'm recruiting a laboratory, not a science club, hee hee!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Which means I can't let just anyone in."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "I have to test candidates to make sure they'll provide value to the group."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Oolong can pass any test!"
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "Oolong knows lots about science."
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "I'll be the judge of that."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "What do you know about, say, mixing chemicals?"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Oolong know that if you mix flour, eggs, and water, you get cake batter!"
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "And cake batter very yummy. Maybe yummier than science."
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "Oolong know about trail mix!"
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "Trail mix have lots of healty things. Healthy makes good brain. Good brain makes science."
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "Oolong know that blue and yellow mix to make green!"
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "Green is good color. Is color of science. Also Oolong."
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "Oolong, I think I have the perfect role for you!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: Oolong plays the Alchemist's Haven.
"Oolong, this music is perfect!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Really?"
directions.speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "The suspenseful undertones! The air of mystery!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "This song encapsulates the feeling of scientific discovery!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Thank."
directions.speaker: Oolong

speech: "You're going to be great for team morale!"
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "Hang on, I've gotta go let my buddy know that we've got another recruit."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "Wow, Oolong made a new friend already!"
speaker: Oolong

speech: "Okay, I've scoped out the room for recruits for Project Explodatorium."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "And see the one over there, with the green skin?"
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "I peeked at their research, and it's exactly what we've been looking for."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "With them on our side, we'll be able to unlock the power of essence for sure!"
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "My heart is racing with excitement, hee hee!"
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "I saw how nervous you were over there."
speaker: Percy

speech: "I think you're in love, my friend."
speaker: Percy

speech: "Here comes the professor. We'll finish this dicussion later."
speaker: Percy
